text:
Good job.
The trainer was really praising Luca.

Apparently, there was a noticeable improvement during
the training camp. Both in physical abilities and expressive skills...
...Did it look like that to you too?
I'm asking if you saw any improvement...

Although I'm not a professional like the trainer,
even I can see the changes with my own eyes.
I'm glad I came to the training camp.

Huh? It's just a matter of practice volume.
It would've been the same even without the camp...

Haha, yeah,
that might be true.

But the fact remains that there were results...
That's good.
